DESCRIPTION: I have a 5x4 grid with a pattern of squares and Xs. There are two columns of Xs on the left and right, with a column of squares in the middle. The top row has three Xs in the left column, and the remaining cells are filled with squares. The bottom row is similar, but with the Xs in the right column. The middle rows have alternating Xs and squares, forming a diagonal pattern from top-left to bottom-right.
